title: This worrying security flaw might let hackers hijack your Wi-Fi
description: There is a flaw in how routers handle network frames, allowing threat actors to inject malicious code and steal data.

title: This Siri replacement may be the closest thing to having ChatGPT on your iPhone
description: Available on the App Store for free, the Perplexity app outdoes ChatGPT by providing sources to its generated content

title: Tools like ChatGPT could lead to major job losses across the world
description: Report claims the way we work may fundamentally change as generative AI enhances productivity, and threatens to take jobs.

title: North Korean APT43 hackers target organizations to launder crypto using cloud
description: Researchers have been tracking the group for five years, but only decided to share the information now.

title: This devious malware looks like it has a whole load of new tricks up its sleeve
description: Two new IcedID variants, named Forked and Lite, were seen lacking key features of the malware, but that's no reason to get complacent.

title: Apple WWDC 2023 is official: here's what we expect to see at Apple's developer event
description: Apple announced WWDC 2023 this week, and the event will officially kick off on June 5. Here's what we know and what we expect.

title: Google Chrome wants to be a helpful classroom assistant
description: Chromebooks and education are almost synonymous these days, but Google thinks it can do even better.

title: This $599 MSI gaming laptop is the perfect budget AutoCAD 2024 notebook
description: Rare price cut pushes GT63 to the top of our most desirable CAD laptop leaderboard

description: Google Workspace and Code collaboration tool Replit’s users are about to get a mutually beneficial deal.

title: Bowers & Wilkins goes green with a fresh finish for the new Pi5 S2 earbuds
description: B&W's new sage green colorway for its more affordable audiophile-friendly true wireless earbuds is here – and they're a glorious look for summer…

title: Google and ADT have finally launched their home security system
description: ADT and Google join forces to create the ultimate smart home security system.

title: OnePlus' new Jupiter Rock phone is here, and it has a heavenly body
description: OnePlus launches its limited-edition Jupiter Rock phone, with 3D microcrystalline rock.

title: iPhone 15 Pro leak suggests new buttons could be impressively versatile

title: E3 2023 suffers yet another blow as Devolver Digital, Sega and more pull out
description: Devolver Digital, Sega and Tencent have announced that they will not be attending E3.

title: Europol warns ChatGPT is being used to commit crime
description: Criminals are using ChatGPT to get concrete steps on how to conduct criminal activity.

title: The Xbox Elite Series 2 is getting some eye-catching color schemes
description: The Xbox Elite Series 2 Core controller is getting new vibrant colors very soon.

title: PCVR fans need to download the next Meta Quest Pro update as soon as possible
description: The Meta Quest Pro's next update will turn on the headset's improved contrast for PCVR software by default.

title: Bitwarden wants to keep all your online secrets safe
description: Bitwarden Secrets Manager is available for all to try.

title: The Insta360 Flow is a DJI smartphone gimbal rival with a handy bonus trick
description: Insta360’s do-it-all Flow is built for smartphone vloggers who want smoother footage and hands-free recording

title: AutoCAD finally gets native Apple silicon support
description: Autodesk adds native AutoCAD support for Apple's M1 and M2 chips, machine learning improvements for automating designs.

title: Microsoft is giving its antivirus and security tools an OpenAI boost
description: Microsoft Security Copilot will use GPT-4 to analyze data signals faster than any human can.

title: Google Chrome will soon get a nifty feature to cut through clutter on the web

description: Microsoft gives up trying to fix Red Dead Redemption 2 in Windows 11 21H2.

title: I tried to use Google Bard to help me with Wordle - but it didn't go well
description: I asked Google Bard to help me with a game of Wordle and I'm disappointed.

title: Microsoft could be working on an AI-powered Windows to rival Chrome OS
description: The tech giant apparently has an AI-assisted ‘modular’ version of Windows in the works, and I’m cautiously optimistic about it.

description: DJI’s streamlined Goggles Integra and RC Motion 2 joystick promise a slicker FPV experience for drone pilots.

description: Apple has begun rolling out betas for iOS 16.5, expected to be the final iOS 16 update before iOS 17.

description: Future astronauts will get to remotely play with rovers, in real-time, and beam the data back to Earth.

title: Microsoft is close to settling its big cloud antitrust case
description: Microsoft is reportedly close to reaching a settlement to end antitrust complaints.

title: Microsoft’s mission to make Windows 11 worse continues with ads in the Start menu
description: When do suggestions become advertising? This is a line Microsoft needs to be extremely careful treading.
